fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Learn the role of all Players.
- Kill everyone who doesnt win with you.
- Show the truth to someone, they will instantly win the game.
- Inspire yourself or someone else at day, they can do their action 25 times the next night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot use your abilities
- You may self-target
- You may choose a person to attack each full
